review: only installed this shit to leave a review

It is not fair to blame DEVELOPERS for the state of the game, but rather the MARKETERS at Blizzard.

I believe it is important to context the following video which talks about Destiny's 2 business approach towards us:

https://youtu.be/ZLbvMWEAoyY  (14:00)

Priority is throwing shit at the consumer, not making something of quality.

Similar with Overwatch 2, the game will never be what its vision was. 

They don't care.

i was promised goku, where's my "hey its me goku!"

Doesn't really deserved to be review bombed like it has.

The game is free.

The game can be fun.

There's no other game I can think of really like it.

The downsides are it can be grindy and to get much you'll need to pay, and that required paying Blizzard, but like... it's free. What did people expect.

Just pick it up, have some fun in Quick play/arcade where people are far less toxic, and ignore the haters.

ã€‚

cat

Once upon a time, I had a cat, I had ten dollars, I would buy it food for eight dollars, bathe it often, and it was very sticky to me.

Later, I took it out to play, passers-by thought it was cute, they fed it cat food, ham sausage, I was very unhappy because it was mine. I wanted to carry it home, but he broke away from me and meowed at the person who gave it good food, I hugged him a few times and he didn't go with me, and scratched me, so I turned around and left.....

Later, I came across it by chance on the road, and it was dirty. Passers-by will only give it good food and play with it, but they will not take it home and bathe it. It saw me and followed me home, I shut it out, it meowed outside the door, it was very uncomfortable,
but I wouldn't want it anymore
.
